text:
This bus stop is located at the main Geylang road, which is after Geylang Lor 10. This is a non sheltered bus stop due to the space constraint. A lot of bus services are passing through this stop so commuters may easily travel to other parts of Singapore or just hop on the bus to reach the nearest MRT station. The nearest MRT station from this bus stop is around 10-15 minutes walkaway so this bus stop serves the neighborhood as well as tourists who stay at nearby hotels.

The bus stops provides clear information of bus numbers and routes on the small information pole. No electronic bus arrival timing so travellers may need to refer to app for the bus arrival timing.

The closest bus stop from our hotel when in Singapore, the bus stop which is located right in front of the Mohd Salleh mosque.

Pretty comfortable, there is a smoking area to wait for the bus.
The bus station near hotel,in front of Seven Eleven. Very convenient to take a bus rather than MRT.
The most important, THIS BUS STOP IS NOT ACCESSIBLE TO WHEELCHAIR USERS. Dirty doesn't matter when. People, garbage,  rats and cockroaches and busy bus stop
This place has some old buildings which reminds the history of Singapore.
